resources.string: "I count on several years of experience, working with Android Kotlin developments to enrich UI activities to give the user a great quality experience."

"I have participated in the XII Annual Android Coding Marathon, obtaining the 15th place in Teams over an group of 15,000 teams form different continents, as well as I was recognized with the "Fastest Coding Award" for two years consecutively."
"* Website: www.kotlin_coder.com \n* Youtube channel: Kotlin Coder \n* Vlog: Modern Kotlin Practices. "

Hi! I am a Java developer with over 3 years of experience. I have worked with object oriented programming, Spring Framework, relational and non-relational databases to build dynamic web applications. I am currently enrolled in Mobile Device Programming course and learning to build android apps.
I have also worked with cross-functional team, multi-cultural workplace and agile. In my free time, I enjoy reading books, watching movies and travelling.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
CAREER NOTE: Completed on-campus studies and currently taking distance education courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science (Available for full-time, W-2 employment).LIYANET ENGINEERING and TECHNOLOGY (Formerly Liya Enterprise Ltd), Asmara, Eritrea• 2015-2018 Software engineer specializing in Java/J2EE technologies to develop applications for different clients.
Senior Software Engineer • 2015-2018 Planned, designed and proposed new development projects. Contributed to all aspects of the software development life cycle for new and existing applications. Applied new technologies to ongoing projects. Supervised and mentored junior programmers.
Tasks Performed: • Played key role in design, development, and deployment of application to production. • Designed database schema and implemented using MySQL. • Exposed services through REST-ful design. • Wrote Unit and integration tests for system • Used Maven to build the modules, Jenkins and Git as code repository • Participated in daily scrums and sprint planning
Achievements: • Deployed application for Ministry of Water, Land and Environment for management of water usage throughout Eritrea.
